Package
Description
org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations.analysis
 
org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations.assoc
The package contains loaders for content of several useful files.
org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations.formats.hpo
HPO-specific implementations of Ontology and related classes.
org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations.io.hpo
Utilities for Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) file I/O.

    DiseaseToGeneAssociation
    This class represents an assertion that a gene or genes is(are) causally involved with a disease.
    DiseaseToGeneAssociations
     
    GeneToAssociation
    This class records the way in which a gene is associated with a disease according to AssociationType, i.e., one of MENDELIAN, DIGENIC, POLYGENIC, UNKNOWN.
